no_more_50_words: Football, a game often played at football stadiums, is a contact-heavy sport that requires the players (who are usually large men) to wear significant protective padding.
100_to_150_words: Football stadiums are popular places for people to gather and watch large men in pads play the game of football. Football is a fast-paced and physical sport, where two teams of 11 players move the ball down the field in an attempt to score points. Football players wear pads to protect themselves from the contact that occurs when they run and smash into each other. The physicality of the game, combined with the tense excitement of the competition, make football stadiums popular places for people to gather and watch the game. The stadiums are also often packed with thousands of cheering fans, creating a high-energy atmosphere that can be thrilling to experience.
